reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 278/91: SPECIAL PAYMENTS TO PHYSICIANS
reg_info.act_under: Health Insurance Act   Loi sur l’assurance-santé

content.content: 1. (1) A special amount is payable by the Plan for insured services rendered by a physician in Ontario to insured persons on or after the 1st day of April, 1989 and before the 1st day of April, 1991. O. Reg. 278/91, s. 1 (1). (2) The special amount is 2 per cent of the total of the amounts payable, for the services rendered by the physician, under the Act and Regulation 552 of the Revised Regulations of Ontario, 1990. O. Reg. 278/91, s. 1 (2). (3) Subsection 15 (5) of the Act does not apply to an account for a special amount. O. Reg. 278/91, s. 1 (3).
content.raw_html:
1. (1) A special amount is payable by the Plan for insured services rendered by a physician in Ontario to insured persons on or after the 1st day of April, 1989 and before the 1st day of April, 1991. O. Reg. 278/91, s. 1 (1).

(2) The special amount is 2 per cent of the total of the amounts payable, for the services rendered by the physician, under the Act and Regulation 552 of the Revised Regulations of Ontario, 1990. O. Reg. 278/91, s. 1 (2).

(3) Subsection 15 (5) of the Act does not apply to an account for a special amount. O. Reg. 278/91, s. 1 (3).
